metadata.title: CVE-2019-6217 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.1.3, tvOS 12.1.2, watchOS 5.1.3,Safari 12.0.3, iTunes 12.9.3 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.10.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6217` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.22.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
